=== Overview ===

Have some downtime while at <nowiki>[[http://scale7x.socallinuxexpo.org|SCaLE]]</nowiki>? Join us in the Logan room at the Westin LAX for a great weekend full of squashing bugs. We'll have presentations all day long, and plenty of people working together to help make Open Source Software great. If you have any questions, visit us on irc.freenode.net at #ubuntu-california or send an email to our <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ca|mailing list]]</nowiki>.

=== Ubuntu Pins ===

If you jam a bug, you'll get an Ubuntu pin.

=== Mozilla Prizes ===

Thanks to the generous support of Mozilla, we have some Mozilla schwag to giveaway during the Bug Jam.
